segments.text: I see the light streaming through the window, creating such a serene atmosphere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But that calm is shattered by the sight of water cascading onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman continues polishing her plate, totally unaware of the potential disaster unfolding.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Itâ€™s remarkable how she can be so lost in her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: My heart races as I watch the boy clamber higher, the stool swaying precariously beneath him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost hear the crash that will surely come if he slips.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside feels like a sharp contrast to this risky scene, so orderly and peaceful.
segments.speaker: PAR
